attributes.action: abandon the absurd idea that a blanket 18% tax rate on Capital Gains Tax is a fairer system than the existing one of taper relief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government introduced Taper Relief to reward those who invest long term in business assets.

It has now done a complete u-turn, the argument being that a flat rate of tax is simpler and fairer.

This is utter rubbish and the effect will be devastating to small businesses as there is no longer an incentive to invest long term.

The Chancellor has made a rash decision and we believe it needs to be reversed before it is implemented in April 2008.
